text: Prisoner of the Mountains (, Kavkazskiy plennik), also known as Prisoner of the Caucasus, is a 1996 Russian Kazakhstani war drama movie directed by Sergei Bodrov and was based on the 1872 novella by Leo Tolstoy. It stars Oleg Menshikov, Sergei Bodrov Jr., Aleksei Zharkov, Aleksandr Bureev and was distributed by Orion Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1997. ==Other websites== * * Category:1996 drama movies Category:1990s war movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Kazakhstani movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sergei Bodrov
title: Prisoner of the Mountains
